properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 17.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECIEVED ON 406 MHZ
IN 34-46.10N 072-19.00W AT 092357Z.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK,
PHONE: 757 398 6231, 757 398 6390,
FAX: 757 398 6392,
E-MAIL: RCCNORFOLK@USCG.MIL,
D05-SMB-D5CC@USCG.MIL.
